chatbot.title: Help
chatbot.intro: Hi, this is Alkemio‚Äôs automated guidance chat. It can provide you with answers based on Alkemio‚Äôs documentation. What are you looking for?

infoDialog.title: Assistance d'Alkemio
infoDialog.content:
Use the Alkemio guidance chat to get automatic answers to your questions from Alkemio‚Äôs documentation.

This is an __advanced search module__ powered by a widely used online generative AI engine. It interprets your question and guides you to the most relevant help from the Alkemio help center. You can see the sources of the answers as well.

__Don‚Äôt worry about your privacy:__ the search engine does not use or store any user data, and it cannot link the interaction to individual users. If you need to contact the Alkemio team, please click the contact button below.

feedback.tooltip: This message has been automatically generated based on Alkemio‚Äôs documentation. Your feedback is highly relevant to us!

references.title: Nouveau utilisateur? Visitez nos pages de d√©marrage!
Trouvez vos r√©ponses dans le Centre d'aide ou la FAQ

3.title: Introducing... My Dashboard!
3.content:
We're very excited to welcome you at your new Alkemio "Homepage": My Dashboard. Here you can easily resume your work and stay updated on your communities. Have a look at these new features:

üöÄ Quick access to your favorite communities You‚Äôll see the last 5 places that you‚Äôve contributed to, whether they are Spaces, Challenges, or Opportunities. To see more, just click on the button on the right.

üîî All the latest activities in one place The Recent Contributions panel shows you everything that‚Äôs going on in your communities. You can filter by Spaces and by your role in them.

...and there is more:

  • Don‚Äôt miss any invitations: they are now shown in the New Memberships block
  • Keep track of your own latest activities with My Latest Contributions
  • Discover new templates from the Innovation Library
  • Make the most out of Alkemio with the ‚ÄòTips and Tricks‚Äô
  • Good to know: The exact layout of your Dashboard depends on whether you're signed in or not, and whether you have any memberships.


Scroll down to explore what else is on your new Dashboard, and tell us what you think! We‚Äôve created a discussion on the [forum](/forum) to hear your feedback.

2.title: Nous avons des nouvelles passionnantes, une nouvelle version pleine de fonctionnalit√©s int√©ressantes est sortie !
2.content:
Exciting news! We've refreshed the main navigation of the platform to let the focus be on your community. Alkemio as a brand is now less visible, taking the role of "powering" your Space. This big and important change also allowed us to simplify the user navigation. So less buttons to distract you from your work inside your Space.

The new layout is as follows:
  • Menu: besides your personal profile and settings, you will now find a menu that includes all the jobs you can do on the platform outside of your Space
  • Navigation: in the top left, you will find the icons of the home page, Space, or Challenge to navigate back
  • Search: as users were often confused by the two search options (in the Space or the entire platform), we have combined them into one search function with the option to filter
We hope this release will bring you one step closer to efficient collaboration! **[Click here](https://alkem-25488729.hs-sites-eu1.com/alkemio-release-2023-11-01)** to read all about the latest changes.

1.title: We have exciting news, a new release full of interesting functionalities is out!
1.content:
After a big refresh of the lay-out and functionalities of the Space, it was time to dive into the Challenges & Opportunities and make some updates.

They are:
  • A more prominent role for the innovation flow that will guide your Challenge or Opportunity.
  • Now you can easily invite both Alkemio users as well as external people to "my" Space.


Among others! **[Click here](https://alkem-25488729.hs-sites-eu1.com/alkemio-release-2023-07-20)** to read all about the latest changes.

cookie.settings: Lorsque vous visitez un site Web, des renseignements peuvent √™tre conserv√©s dans votre navigateur sous la forme de cookies. Ces informations peuvent concerner vous, vos pr√©f√©rences et votre appareil. Ces informations sont principalement utilis√©es pour rendre le site aussi bon que possible et certains sites les utilisent √† des fins de marketing. Comme Alkemio n'autorise aucune publicit√© sur son site web, nous ne distinguons que deux types de cookies.
cookie.technical: Les cookies techniquement n√©cessaires : vous permettent de naviguer et d'utiliser les fonctions de base et de stocker vos pr√©f√©rences.
cookie.analysis: Les cookies d'analyse : nous permettent de d√©terminer comment les visiteurs interagissent avec nos services afin d'am√©liorer l'exp√©rience utilisateur.

help-dialog.title: Vous cherchez de l'aide?
help-dialog.text:
Nous voulons vous aider √† utiliser la plate-forme Alkemio, et pour ce faire, nous voulons rendre le processus d'utilisation et d'interaction plus facile. Voici comment vous pouvez avoir un impact sur les sujets qui vous int√©ressent.
